name: Sky Attack-Fighter Legend
description:
Sky Attack-Fighter Legend-The endless battle against the monsters of the sky. You are the only supper air fighter with the strength to stop this battle. This is an air attack combat game with thrilling gameplay, stunning 3D effects and impressive ingame sounds.
FEATURE
- Amazing lighting and special effects
- Includes Power-ups and Bosses!
- Leader board global.
- Lucky circle.

HOW TO PLAY
- Move spaceship
- Kill space intruders
- Upgrade spaceship
- Change your weapons.
